default.$description:
Main surface background, one layer above page. Serves as the primary container surface color.

USED IN: Sidepanels, configuration panel, Node Monitor

muted.$description: Muted background, one layer above surface-default. Used for secondary sections or nested containers on main surface. USED IN: Table Column Header, Value Switch bg, Card Array

subtle.$description: Topmost background, one layer above surface-muted. USED IN: –

default.$description:
The base background for the entire app, on which all other surfaces sit.
The darkest background color in the light theme.
USED IN: Workflow Canvas

initial.$description: Transparent background for clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: For the initial states of elements with a transparent background e.g. Link (initial), Button (transparent), .ValueSwitch-item (initial), TabBar (initial)

hover.$description: Subtle neutral overlay on hover for clickable elements. USED IN: Button Transparent, List Item

active.$description: Stronger neutral overlay for active (pressed) state feedback. USED IN: Button Transparent, List Item

initial.$description: More prominent background for clickable or neutral elements.USED IN: Badge

hover.$description: Darker background on hover for more prominent clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: Badge

active.$description: Darkest background on pressed for more prominent clickable or neutral elements. USED IN: Badge

initial.$description: Light-teal background for primary actions or highlights.

hover.$description: Darker teal background on hover for primary actions. USED IN: Button (outline and transparent variants), ProgressButton (Outline variant), SplitButton (outline), .TabBar-Item, Toggle, chip

active.$description: Darkest teal background on pressed for primary actions. USED IN: Button (outline and transparent variants), ProgressButton (Outline variant), SplitButton (outline), .TabBar-Item, Toggle, chip

initial.$description: Deep Teal background for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

hover.$description: Darker teal background on hover for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

active.$description: Darkest teal background on pressed for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

initial.$description: Light-teal highlight for selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item

hover.$description: Darker teal on hover for backgrounds in selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item, List Item

active.$description: Darkest teal on pressed for backgrounds in selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item, List Item

initial.$description: Mid-teal background for most prominent, selectable elements. USED IN: RadioButton

hover.$description:
Darker mid-teal background on hover for most prominent, selectable elements.
USED IN: RadioButton

active.$description:
Darkest mid-teal background on pressed for most prominent, selectable elements.
USED IN: RadioButton

initial.$description: Very light red background for error or destructive states (red 100, lightened 60%).

hover.$description:
Darker red background on hover for error or destructive states.
USED IN: Inline Message

active.$description:
Darkest red background on hover for error or destructive states.
USED IN: Inline Message

initial.$description:
More prominent red background for most prominent, error or destructive states.
USED IN: Destructive Button

hover.$description:
Darker red background on hover for most prominent, error callouts or destructive buttons.
USED IN: Destructive Button

active.$description:
Darker red background on pressed for most prominent, error callouts or destructive buttons.
USED IN: Destructive Button

initial.$description: Light orange background for warning states. USED IN: Inline Message

hover.$description:
Darker orange background on hover for warning states.
USED IN: Inline Message

active.$description:
Darkest orange background on pressed for warning states.
USED IN: Inline Message

initial.$description: More prominent orange background for most prominent, warning states.

hover.$description:
Darker orange background on hover for most prominent, warning states.
USED IN: –

active.$description:
Darkest orange background on pressed for most prominent, warning states.
USED IN: –

initial.$description: Light green background for success states. USED IN: Inline Message

hover.$description:
Darker green background on hover for success states.
USED IN: Inline Message

active.$description:
Darkest green background on pressed for success states.
USED IN: Inline Message

initial.$description: More prominent green background for most prominent, success states.

hover.$description:
Darker green background on hover for most prominent, success states.
USED IN: –

active.$description:
Darkset green background on pressed for most prominent, success states.
USED IN: –

initial.$description:
More prominent blue background for most prominent, informational messages.
USED IN: –

hover.$description:
Darker blue background on hover for informational messages.
USED IN: Inline Message

active.$description:
Darkest blue background on pressed for informational messages.
USED IN: Inline Message

initial.$description:
More prominent blue background for most prominent, informational messages.
USED IN: –

hover.$description:
Darker blue background on hover for most prominent, informational messages.
USED IN: –

active.$description:
Darkest blue background on pressed for most prominent, informational messages.
USED IN: –

initial.$description: Vibrant brand yellow background for branding elements. USED IN: DesktopHeader-Tab

hover.$description:
Darker brand color on hover for branding elements.
USED IN: DesktopHeader-Tab

active.$description:
Darkest brand color on pressed for branding elements.
USED IN: DesktopHeader-Tab

initial.$description: Neutral background for input elements. USED IN: Checkbox, RadioButton, Input components

hover.$description:
Darker neutral background on hover for input elements.
USED IN: Checkbox, RadioButton, Input components

active.$description:
Darkest neutral background on pressed for input elements.
USED IN: Checkbox, RadioButton, Input components

default.$description:
Neutral overlay for component backgrounds in the disabled state.
USED IN: Buttons, checkboxes, input fields, and other components when disabled.

neutral.$description: Text and icon color for primary content on light surfaces

muted.$description: Muted text and icon color for secondary content on light surfaces.

subtle.$description: Subtle text and icon color for e.g. helper text inside input fields.

neutral-inverted.$description: Text and icon color for primary content on dark surfaces.

primary.$description: Teal accent color for text and icons on light surfaces.

primary-inverted.$description: Light teal color for text and icons on light surfaces.

selected.$description: Teal color for selected text and icons on light surfaces.

selected-inverted.$description: Very light teal color for selected text and icons on light surfaces.

warning.$description: Orange color for warning text and icons on light surfaces (e.g warning backgrounds)

warning-inverted.$description: Light orange color for warning text and icons on light surfaces. (e.g warning backgrounds)

danger.$description: Red color for danger text and icons on light surfaces. (e.g danger backgrounds)

danger-inverted.$description: Light red color for danger text and icons on light surfaces. (e.g danger backgrounds)

success.$description: Green color for success text and icons on light surfaces. (e.g success backgrounds)

success-inverted.$description: Light green color for success text and icons on light surfaces. (e.g success backgrounds)

disabled.$description: Dimmed neutral color for text and icons in the disabled state.

info.$description: Blue color for informational text and icons on light surfaces.

neutral.$description:
❌ Neutral border for components.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

muted.$description:
❌ Muted neutral border for less emphasis.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

subtle.$description:
❌ Subtle neutral border for faint components.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

primary-bold.$description:
❌ Dark teal border accent for most prominent emphasis.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

primary.$description:
❌ Light teal border accent for emphasis.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

selected-bold.$description:
❌ Teal border indicating the selected state (most prominent).
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

selected.$description:
❌ Faint teal border indicating the selected state.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

warning-bold.$description:
❌ Orange border for most prominent warnings.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

warning.$description:
❌ Orange border for warnings.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

danger-bold.$description:
❌ Red border for most prominent error elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

danger.$description:
❌ Red border for error elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

success-bold.$description:
❌ Green border for most prominent success elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

success.$description:
❌ Green border for success elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

info-bold.$description:
❌ Blue border for most prominent info elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

info.$description:
❌ Blue border for info elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

transparent.$description:
❌ Fully transparent border for components with invisible borders.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

disabled.$description:
❌ Neutral border for components in the disabled state.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

brand.$description:
❌ Yellow border accent for brand highlights.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

neutral-bold-initial.$description:
❌ Neutral border for ResizeHandler.
[Used as reference token only for the ResizeHandler composite tokens]

neutral-bold-hover.$description:
❌ Neutral border for ResizeHandler.
[Used as reference token only for the ResizeHandler composite tokens]

neutral-bold-active.$description:
❌ Neutral border for ResizeHandler.
[Used as reference token only for the ResizeHandler composite tokens]

outline.$description:
❌ Blue outline highlight for focused elements.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

default.$description: Dimmed overlay background for modals and dialogs.
Shimmering gray placeholder gradient for loading content animation.

top.$description: Light shadow layer color for the top elevation USED IN:

middle.$description: Medium shadow layer color for mid-level elevation. USED IN:

bottom.$description: Dark shadow layer color for bottom elevation. USED IN:
